generate(double[], int, int, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.Noise
fills the given array with noise values within the range [-max;max]

fills a new array with noise values within the range [-max;max]
generate(int, double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.math.Noise
fills a new array with noise values within the range [-max;max]
the initial interval will be length / 4 and the final interval 4

the initial interval will be length / 4 and the final interval 4

genLinear(double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen
a not scientific way to convert a value between 0 and 1 to a color, where 0 means red, 0.5 means green and 1 means blue
genPhysically(double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen
a scientifically nearly correct way to convert the wavelength of light to a rgb-color in the visible spectrum
a value of 380 will be ultra-violet
a value of 780 will be infra-red
genRealistic(double) - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen
a wrapper to genPhysically() but with a mathematical range of values
a value of 1 will be ultra-violet
a value of 0 will be infra-red
so with look to genPhysically() the range of values is flipped
GeometricBodyBuilder - Class in fast3d.simple.shapes
base class for constructing groups of triangles or AdvTriangles (depending on what field you set (material or color)) that make up the shape of a geometric body (a box or cone for instance)
at least setMaterial(Material) XOR setColor() has to be set (if both are set than color is ignored)
multiple builds are independent to one another
at last, when all attributes are set, call build() to create a Group of the specified shape
subclasses are meant to build the shapes around Vector3d.zero() (as the groups center) and by default of size (diameter) 1d
GeometricBodyBuilder() - Constructor for class fast3d.simple.shapes.GeometricBodyBuilder
 
GeometricObject - Interface in fast3d.math.geom
the built-in geometric objects can be analyzed using fast3d.util.RelationshipAnalytics
get3dScreenPoint(int, int) - Method in class fast3d.Panel3d
for a given coordinate on the Panel3d the 3d point in the universe is returned that is on the screen at the transformed given screen position

getAbsolute(Vector2d) - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Texture

the coordinates are within 0..width or 0..height (overflow is managed automatically)

getRatio(Vector2d, Vector2d) - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector2d
returns the ratio between the two given parallel vectors or Double.NaN if they are not parallel
if given vectors a and b the ratio is defined as:
a = ratio * b so that ratio = a / b;
getRatio(Vector3d, Vector3d) - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector3d
returns the ratio between the two given parallel vectors or Double.NaN if they are not parallel
if given vectors a and b the ratio is defined as:
a = ratio * b so that ratio = a / b;
getRatio(Vector4d, Vector4d) - Static method in class fast3d.math.Vector4d
returns the ratio between the two given parallel vectors or Double.NaN if they are not parallel
if given vectors a and b the ratio is defined as:
a = ratio * b so that ratio = a / b;

getVertices() - Method in interface fast3d.Renderable
should return every vertex used during render() to accelerate the shading and rendering
a renderable is requested to return all its vertices here
may return null if no vertices are used for whatever reason or the vertices are not known yet

getViewmode() - Method in class fast3d.math.CameraMode
should be used instead of direct access to the field because enums can be null and the viewmode should have a valid value -not null-
if the viewmode field contains null it will be set to Viewmode.PERSPECTIVE as requested by the Viewmode doc and then the value is returned

Graphics3d - Class in fast3d.graphics
with a graphics3d you can draw directly onto a regular 2d-screen but in 3d
Graphics3d(Graphics2D, Shader, Light...) - Constructor for class fast3d.graphics.Graphics3d

GRAY() - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen
 
green() - Method in class fast3d.graphics.Color
 
GREEN() - Static method in class fast3d.util.ColorGen
 
Group - Class in fast3d.complex
a class to combine multiple triangles
the renderable interface is implemented just to make this addable to an universe and to make it detectable by raytracing, on call of render nothing happens
note: to add this to an universe does not mean to add the triangles to the universe, but just to make clicking and selecting work
a group is just a way of organizing data for a scenery or an object, considering the model-view-controller model it is requested to used addToUniverse() instead of adding this to a universe
hint: although the contained Renderables can build an 3d-object, they can be independent
Group(Vector3d, Triangle...) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Group
 
Group(Triangle...) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Group
the initial position will be Vector3d.zero()
Group(Vector3d, List<Triangle>) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Group
 
Group(List<Triangle>) - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.Group
the initial position will be Vector3d.zero()
GroupOperator - Class in fast3d.complex
if some triangles are hold by more than one group it might be necessary to calculate which is in both, only in one, only in the other and so on, to not remove or add one multiple times to or from a universe or remove a triangle not if it is hold by another group in the universe
GroupOperator() - Constructor for class fast3d.complex.GroupOperator
 
groups - Variable in class fast3d.complex.Object
direct access to the internal storage permitted
